meanings.sent1: The steak was overdone and very tough to chew.
meanings.sent2: The cookies were overdone and burnt to a crisp.
meanings.sent3: The overdone pasta resembled a pile of rubber bands.
meanings.sent4: Her overdone makeup made her look like a clown.
meanings.sent5: The overdone steak was like eating shoe leather.

meanings.sent1: The decorations at the party were overdone and overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: Her reaction to the news was completely overdone.
meanings.sent3: His overdone excitement for the movie was contagious.
meanings.sent4: The drama in the play was so overdone it became comical.
meanings.sent5: The overdone praise for the simple task seemed insincere.

meanings.sent1: After the long hike, she felt overdone and needed to rest.
meanings.sent2: The athlete looked overdone after finishing the marathon.
meanings.sent3: His overdone yawn indicated how tired he was.
meanings.sent4: The overdone worker struggled to keep their eyes open.
meanings.sent5: The overdone student fell asleep during the lecture.
